attributes.action: Referrendum on ejecting Scotland from the UK
attributes.additional_details: Given that Scotland has voted to remain within the UK, the rest of the UK (England, Wales and Northern Ireland) should now be given the opportunity to say whether we wish them to remain part of the union, or whether they should be ejected and be made independent.

rejection.details:
Petition Title: Referendum to Remove Scotland from the UK

Created By: Jack Chambers

Closing: 30/03/2015
